jcr:root.description: Take some of the most outstanding pictures of your life: 20MP + 12MP camera modules, Optical Image Stabilisation (OIS), Artistic portraits and unique selfies in Leica image style. Redefine modern portrait photography.
jcr:root.title: HUAWEI + LEICA
